content: seamless earflap hat pattern created by lindsey carr crochetbycarr@gmail com www facebook com/crochetbycarr the written pattern and pictures may not be copied shared or sold in full or in part the finished product is yours to do with as you wish including personal use gifting charity and non-commercial sale if you are selling online i d love it if you would share a link to my website crochet by carr do not copy share or sell page 1 pattern notes materials gauge worsted weight yarn rounds 1-3 measure 3 inches in diameter i hook adjust hook size to meet gauge sewing needle if needed stitch marker pattern notes *a stitch marker will be helpful in de termining the round you are on *this pattern is worked in a continuous round do not join rounds * stitch counts are included at the end of each round *the bottom of the hat slants due to working in the round to account for this the right earflap is one round shorter abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet decrease note when a number precedes a st itch abbreviation you will put that number of stitches into the same stitch for example 2hdc means put 2 half_double_crochet in the same stitch crochet by carr do not copy share or sell page 2 0-3 months hat 1 in a magic_ring single_crochet half_double_crochet 7 do not join rounds 8 2 2hdc around 16 3 half_double_crochet 2hdc around 24 4 half_double_crochet 2 2hdc around 32 5 half_double_crochet 3 2hdc around 40 6-12 half_double_crochet around 40 do not fasten_off you will now start the left earflap left ear flap 1 half_double_crochet 12 chain 1 turn 12 2 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 10 3 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 8 4 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 6 5 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 4 6 half_double_crochet-decrease 2 fasten_off 2 right ear flap skip 4 stitches at the back of the hat and attach yarn in the 5th stitch 1 chain 1 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 10 2 half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet-decrease chain 1 turn 4 5 half_double_crochet-decrease 2 2 chain 1 single_crochet evenly around the bottom of hat and earflaps fasten_off and weave in ends cut 9 four foot lengths of yarn for each braid use a hook to pull through the bottom stitches of each earflap split the yarn into 3 equal groups of 6 strands each braid to desired length tie an overhand knot to secure trim
